cctypes.comment: Restrict which cards to show on the ePDQ payment page.

sha_in.label: DirectLink SHA-IN Pass Phrase
sha_in.comment: Differs from the regular SHA-IN Pass Phrase.

appmerce_epdq.label: Appmerce Barclaycard ePDQ Settings
appmerce_epdq.comment: Extension by Appmerce | Get Support

userid.label: User ID
userid.comment: Optional. Use only if you want to register transactions associated with a specific user.

sha_in.label: SHA-IN Pass Phrase
sha_in.comment: See ePDQ technical settings Data and origin verification.

alias_usage.label: Alias Usage
alias_usage.comment: A short text explaining why you want to store the Credit Card data.

debug_flag.label: Debug Mode
debug_flag.comment: See database table epdq_api_debug for debug information.

base_currency.label: Use Base Currency
base_currency.comment: Disable to use currency from user session.

iphone.label: Enable iPhone Template
iphone.comment: Auto-detect iPhone and use ePDQ's iPhone static template.

template.label: Payment Template
template.comment: The ePDQ template is hosted by ePDQ. You need https:// to use the Magento template, which is part of your theme (appmerce/epdq/payment.phtml).

txtcolor.label: Text Color of the ePDQ Template

tblbgcolor.label: Table Background Color of the ePDQ Template

tbltxtcolor.label: Table Text Color of the ePDQ Template

buttonbgcolor.label: Button Background Color of the ePDQ Template

buttontxtcolor.label: Button Text Color of the ePDQ Template

fonttype.label: Font Family of the ePDQ Template

logo.label: Logo of the ePDQ Template
logo.comment: URL/ filename of the logo. The URL must be absolute and stored on a secure server (https://)
